MIPS instructions:

R type:
		000000 00001 00010 00011 00000 100000  //add R1 & R2 into R3
		000000 00011 00001 00100 00000 100010  //sub R3 & R1 into R4
		000000 00001 00010 00101 00000 011000  //mult R1 & R2 into R5
		000000 00100 00101 00110 00000 011010  //div R4 & R5 into R6
		000000 00001 00011 00111 00000 101010  //slt R1 & R3 into R7
		000000 00110 00111 01000 00000 100100  //and R6 & R7 into R8
		000000 00110 00111 01001 00000 100101  //or R6 & R7 into R9
		000000 00110 00111 01010 00000 100111  //nor R6 & R7 into R10
		000000 00110 00111 01011 00000 100110  //xor R6 & R7 into R11 


I type:
		001000 00001 00010 0000000000000101  //add R1 & imm(5) into R2
		001010 00010 00011 0000000000000011  //slt R2 & imm(3) into R3
		001100 00001 00100 0000000000000100  //and R1 & imm(4) into R4
		001101 00010 00101 0000000000000110  //or R2 & imm(6) into R5
		001110 00100 00110 0000000000000111  //xor R4 & imm(7) into R6
		101011 00001 00110 0000000000000000  //sw R1 into R6
		100011 00110 00010 0000000000000000  //lw R6 into R2


J type:
